sentence: P&G ( NYSE:PG ) was a solid performer in the quarter, along with the general strength in the consumer staples sector.
Over the last few years, P&G has exited many non-core businesses and has continued restructuring operations to allow management to focus on those markets with the best prospects for long-term growth.
